channel.title: -Neutronium Scape-
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/34ni39e.png[/img][/center] [center][IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2woh9pt.png[/img][/center] [center][size=12pt][b]The Server Were Even The Smallest Things Matter[/b][/size][/center] [center][IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2woh9pt.png[/img][/center] [center]Welcome to Neutronium. Founded on the 16th December 2011. We aim to succeed and grow in our own time. Whilist we grow we will always offer the best. and nothing less.[/center]
[center] In the current time we are looking for:[/center] [center]-Graphic Designers-[/center] [center]-Server Moderators-[/center] [center]-Forums Administrators-[/center] [center]If you wish to apply please use the format and answer in as much detail as possible.
Name: Age: Applying For what role: Experience and extent of knowledge: Proof of experience: How active will you be: What other skills can you bring to the team: What timezone are you in:
MSN: Skype:[/center]
[center][IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2woh9pt.png[/img][/center]
[center][b][size=14pt]About Us[/size][/b][/center]
[center] Neutronium Scape is currently entirely owned by two sole owners, me (Fade) and a T1G ER [/center] [center]My role is to develop a website and all other of server work. T1G ER works on the server and is the main coder, he has lots of experience. He will also be hosting the server online untill enough donations are reached to purchase a reasonable VPS.[/center]
[center][IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2woh9pt.png[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/1p9gjn.png[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2woh9pt.png[/img][/center]
Please note, no server ps are up because it is still being worked on.
-Thanks For Reading, Feel Free To Apply or contact me on skype: TehVisual
